column4: "Version of PEAT that performed the pull
"ID of the PEAT run for this pull. This is the value of ``agent.id`` in Elasticsearch. Used for associating other artifacts (e.g. device files) with this particular pull."
"PEAT device modules used to perform the pull"
"Targets used by the pull. These are the actual targets used after PEAT has parsed them into usable targets and removed duplicates."

column6: "Original arguments used for the pull. This is the targets as provided by the user prior to PEAT parsing them into usable targets and removing duplicates."

column4: "Devices that were pulled from. Note that this may differ from ``pull_targets`` based on the results of scanning and/or de-duplication."
"Number of hosts that were pulled from"

column5: with some fields excluded (such as binary blobs)"
